summary: I WAS DRIVING ON THE STREET THE BRAKE INDICATOR LOW BRAKE FLUID LIGHT CAME ON SUDDENLY. I STEPPED ON THE BRAKE PADDLE AND THERE WERE NO BRAKES. I SHIFTED TO 1ST GEAR AND COASTED TO SIDE OF THE STREET. I CHECKED RESERVOIR AND IT WAS VERY LOW. I FILLED THE RESERVOIR BUT WAS EMPTY IN A FEW MINUTES BUT I DID NOT SEE ANY LEAKS ANYWHERE.
